MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G31 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:08am. Our engineers have arrived at the Aberfoyle Street substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:47am on Thursday, 07 January 2021
